item.title: Boolean nonWild the easy way?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

lol thats my way

heres mine with all the coords stuff taken out, put them in urself

public boolean nonWild() { if ((absX >= 1234 && absX <= 1234 && absY >= 1234 && absY <= 1234) || (absX >= 1234 && absX <= 1234 && absY >= 1234 && absY <= 1234) { return false; } else { return true; } }

specify the coords to ur liking for ur server, remember u choosing the coords making the wild areas

Read full topic

item.title: Boolean nonWild the easy way?
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

i was thinking instead of haveing to declare all the safe zones why not just declare the unsafe zones like so

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3039 && absX <= 3111 && absY >= 3475 && absY <= 3523 )) // the unsafe zones return false; else return true; }
